meanings.definition: Not familiar or used to something
meanings.sent1: She felt unaccustomed to the new school environment.
meanings.sent2: The traveler was unaccustomed to the local customs.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked unaccustomed to wearing a tiny hat.
meanings.sent5: The unaccustomed taste of the exotic fruit lingered on her tongue.

meanings.definition: Not accustomed or habituated to something
meanings.sent1: The puppy was unaccustomed to walking on a leash.
meanings.sent2: He was unaccustomed to waking up early on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The robot seemed unaccustomed to human emotions.
meanings.sent4: Her unaccustomed clumsiness led to a series of mishaps.
meanings.sent5: The unaccustomed silence in the bustling city was eerie.
